title: Use env var to pass sharding options to test_nn.py
body_html: Buck doesn't support passing arguments to Python unit tests, and we have to use environment variables to pass the sharding options instead. Also, buck test doesn't go through the __name__ == '__main__' code path and we need to move the env var checking logic to top-level.
body_text: Buck doesn't support passing arguments to Python unit tests, and we have to use environment variables to pass the sharding options instead. Also, buck test doesn't go through the __name__ == '__main__' code path and we need to move the env var checking logic to top-level.
body: Buck doesn't support passing arguments to Python unit tests, and we have to use environment variables to pass the sharding options instead. Also, buck test doesn't go through the `__name__ == '__main__'` code path and we need to move the env var checking logic to top-level.
